channel.title: How Can I make ppl keep stuff after they die?
channel.description: IN my server ppl were complaing about admins not losing stuff... so how can I make the regular ppl too not lose stuff>?

item.title: How Can I make ppl keep stuff after they die?

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Look right below that method.

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2

item.source: How Can I make ppl keep stuff after they die?

item.title: How Can I make ppl keep stuff after they die?
item.dc:creator: @poh poh
item.description:
@poh wrote:

Could not find && !playerRights >= 2
So i looked up apply and it gave me
// If killed apply dead
if (deathStage == 1) {
if (attacknpc > 0) { // was killed by a npc -bakatool
server.npcHandler.ResetAttackPlayer(attacknpc);
}
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();

		deathStage = 2;
		poisoned = false;
		poisonDmg = false;
		fighting = false;
		hits = 0;
		startAnimation(0x900);
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		deathTimer = System.currentTimeMillis();
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
		playerLevel[1] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]);
		playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
		playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
		playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
		playerLevel[6] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]);
		sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687);
		resetfollowers();
		refreshSkills();
		killMyNPCs();
		resetKnight();
		skulledBy = "";

What shud i do?

Read full topic

ApplyDead method, it will say something like this:

&& !playerRights >= 2
